Directions: In a large mixing bowl, beat the ice cream and coffee until blended; set aside. In a small mixing bowl, beat the cream cheese, chocolate syrup and sugar. Fold in whipped topping. Remove 1/4 cup; cover and refrigerate. Add remaining chocolate mixture to ice cream mixture. Pour into crust; freeze until firm.
Pour reserved chocolate mixture over the top; swirl gently. Cover and freeze for up to 2 months. Just before serving, sprinkle with crushed candy bar.
Ingredients: 3 cups butter pecan ice cream, softened
1 (1.4 ounce) bar Heath candy bars, crushed
